about_the_game:
The world is on the verge of an epic clash between the forces of good and evil. Whether you fight to defend the weak or to take over the world, this set will ensure you're on the side of victory.

This set includes 1 costume each for 16 characters: Kasumi, Ayane, Kokoro, Momiji, Tina, Hitomi, Leifang, Christie, Mila, Nyotengu, Marie Rose, Honoka, Zack, Hayate, Hayabusa, and Raidou.

*You must have the latest update installed before using this costume.

©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.
detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

The world is on the verge of an epic clash between the forces of good and evil. Whether you fight to defend the weak or to take over the world, this set will ensure you're on the side of victory. This set includes 1 costume each for 16 characters: Kasumi, Ayane, Kokoro, Momiji, Tina, Hitomi, Leifang, Christie, Mila, Nyotengu, Marie Rose, Honoka, Zack, Hayate, Hayabusa, and Raidou. *You must have the latest update installed before using this costume. ©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.

subs.option_text: DOA5LR DLC Fighter Force Costume Set - $24.99

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over

oflc.descriptors: Violence, sexualised imagery and nudity, online interactivity

pegi.descriptors: Violence, sexual and online gameplay with other people.
